name: Royal Rodents
description:
Play as an opossum king fighting to take over unfortunate souls' backyards. Increase your troops, build new structures, collect resources, and attack the neighboring rodent kingdoms to strengthen your own. When night falls, become the dominant king by defeating the enemy kings and collecting their crowns. Dig your way to victory in this casual, comical, and exciting strategy game!

Need more help? View our gameplay guide here.

 

Free to download on PC and mobile devices Debuted at 2020 Stout Game Expo Programmers: Steve Datz, Tyler Garcia, Ethan Kapelka Artists: Anna Thiele, Kali Gardner, Josh Gear-Heitman

Watch our gameplay video!
